GSD.description:
udf: Fix preallocation discarding at indirect extent boundary

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.15 by commit ae56d9a017724f130cf1a263dd82a78d2a6e3852. For more details please see the references link.
